summary: With this mod, you can now see which factions you are in, and what rank.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17924]Link to Special Edition version[/url]
[/size]
[i]
In Oblivion and Morrowind, you could see what factions you were in, and what rank you were.
This was removed in Skyrim.[/i]
  
With this mod, you can now see which factions you are in, and what rank.(The Factions menu is in Mod Configuration)

[b]Factions
[/b]Bards College
Blood-Kin of the Orcs
College of Winterhold
House Telvanni (Dragonborn DLC)
Imperial legion
Nightingales
Riekling tribe (Dragonborn DLC)
Stormcloaks (Sons of Skyrim)
The Companions
The Dark Brotherhood
The Dawnguard (Dawnguard DLC)
The Greybeards
The Thieves Guild
Volkihar Vampire Clan (Dawnguard DLC)

It is shown where you are a Thane.
Will also show if you are the Champion of a Daedric Prince.
 
 
[center][size=4][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/center]
[center][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/]SkyUI[/url][/center]


[center][size=4]Recommended Mods
[/size] 
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60445/]SkyComplete[/url]
[/size][i]Tracks quests and locations
[/i][/center]
author: Reath
